attributes.action: Tear up the withdrawal agreement and fully leave the EU with No Deal
attributes.additional_details: Tearing up the withdrawal agreement and leaving fully with no deal and no strings attached is the best possible outcome for regaining our freedom as an independent country.
attributes.background: It is obvious to us the EU do not want to give us a good deal and they are acting in bad faith.  No deal is better than a bad deal.   No deal is the best deal that we are going to get out of the EU.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313464
